name: Travel With Spaghetti
description:
Read before playing:

The man who once ate spaghetti and heard the call of god of spaghetti, so  he decide to Spread the Gospel of the spaghetti god.

Attack: J

In stage1, he will find some useful tool. The hook can help him to carry boxes to him, or help him to move in some certain places.(press k). The candy will seduce the enemy to the position of candy(press l). 

In stage2, he will find the sprite of fork, which makes him to jump one more time where the forks place.  The spaghetti sieve can control his enemy(press k) in some certain place. The meatball can help him to jump ,or attack his enemy.(press l)

Every Stage, he has to start with noting, and when he finishes his travell, his goes to the tollet, leavinghim nothing.
